title: Competition of associational groups in pluralism

content.prompt: A pluralist interest group system is best characterized by

choices.label: high levels of control by business elites in policymaking
a system wherein only the interests of the government are  considered
the inclusion of only a few corporations during the public policymaking process

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
